Member Function Documentation

delete ( $  id = NULL  ) 

Delete gpx file number $id. Must be logged in as the owner of the file or an administrator to do this.

Definition at line 89 of file gpxfiles.php.

edit ( $  id = null  ) 

if $id is not null, we populate the form from the database and display it to the user. if $map_id is null, and POST data has been provided, we update the gpxfile specified in the POST data with the supplied data. If $id is null and there is no POST data, we create a new gpxfile spec.

Definition at line 21 of file gpxfiles.php.

get_gpxfile ( $  id  ) 

returns the contents of GPX file id number $id. If ?ajax=TRUE is included on the URL, it will return the GPX file ID, description and contents as a JSON string.

index (  ) 

Definition at line 17 of file gpxfiles.php.

list_gpxfiles ( $  errmsg = NULL  ) 

lists all of the GPX files in the database as an html table with edit and delete links. If ?ajax is included on the command line, it returns all of the IDs and descriptions as in json format to be used by other code.

Parameters:
: ?ajax on the command line to return json rather than html.
errmsg,: If returning html, errmsg will be printed at the top of hte page.
